aka: Right Places: Sono Toki, Boku no Irubeki Basho
this_title: Right Places その時, ぼくの居るべき場所
trans_title: Right Places: Sono Toki, Boku no Irubeki Basho
introduction: A boy starts to see strange animals that appear in his city. As seasons pass, the boy wonders why he is able to see them and feels lonely because he is the only one able to do so. However, one day he realizes that he is not alone anymore.
chinese_title: Right Places その時, ぼくの居るべき場所
